sources.title: Une balle dans le canon (1958)
sources.description: Back from Indochina, Tony and Dick, two French soldiers, are now in possession of more than 20 million, entrusted by a trafficker. They buy a nightclub in the district of Montparnasse but are soon hunted by the thug who wants to recover his money. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/une-balle-dans-le-canon-1958/
